title: Please Don't Make the Poro Sakura Icons Japan Exclusive :(
body:
I really want one of these, but it sucks they're only available on Japan. Can we make these available for everyone?

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Axotq2ytMJg\

It is a crime not to make these available for everyone ._. ~ They're so stinkin cute.

For those that aren't aware, this is a two part (ongoing) Japanese exclusive event. The first part is already concluded, which sucks, but this is a great opportunity for other cultures to learn more about Japan and the cherry blossom festival. Let's spread cultural awareness and bring this event (or at least the icons) to other servers too! 

http://hanarifu.jp.leagueoflegends.com/imgs/reward-06.png
http://hanarifu.jp.leagueoflegends.com/imgs/reward-03.png

replies.body:
When was the last time NA had something exclusive :(. 

I really dont remember tho lol
Neither does EUW
if they make a losers bracket for worlds that would hit two birds with one stone
{{summoner:14}}
savage af man chill :P
EUW *just* got the Slumber Party...
http://i.imgur.com/1U3lNEH.gif

Checked with the e-commerce team today and the plan is that these icons will make their way to regions outside of Japan "soon"  (FORGIVE ME). 

I have no context on pricing or a specific launch date though.
Omg yes!!! Thank you so much for looking into this :) !
thank you so much ritoooo, gg wp <3

that poro looks so happy with life
Hey, whats going on with those icons?
whooo thatnx

Sorry to bother! is there any update on this? It's been over a month ^^

> [{quoted}](name=WookieeCookie,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=MOrmmE69,comment-id=000f,timestamp=2017-04-05T00:00:58.469+0000)
>
> Checked with the e-commerce team today and the plan is that these icons will make their way to regions outside of Japan "soon"  (FORGIVE ME). 
> 
> I have no context on pricing or a specific launch date though.

I love you. So much. I was crying internally when I found out only Japan got them.

Is this for Certain? Im not complaining, i was just under the impression that it was JPN only, and i couldnt resist such a cute thing, so my main is currently sitting on JPN servers waiting for rewards :( (Transferred from EUNE, played with 300 ping) ... I really wanted it ;_;

Nah we just need those
[http://i.imgur.com/5qoaCrI.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/5qoaCrI.jpg)
I think they need to work on identifying the difference between a frog and duck before they grant them ;)

Wait it's festival celebration? I don't understand why other events and festivals get to all servers but not this one? I get it that Lunar Revel has skins and stuff but seriously why do we get to celebrate that but not this? I didn't know about this and I agree that it might've been more public. Even If the icons were exclusive to Japan, I don't mind them having something special, but it feels like the occasion's being ignored.

I mean besides Ocean Week and for the first time this one, I can't really think of any server events. 
+ You guys have that Slumber Party one that no one else gets right now.

What's Slumber Party? O_o
EDIT: Lol, I found it, thanks I didn't even know about it.
That slumberparty thing was really bad tho... + there is no exklusive icon or something like that
It will probably be like the OCE server icons. They were only available to them for awhile, then only recently came out to other regions.
...for 250 RP each.
There's still quite a few icons that remain server exclusive :c I'd really not like these to be one of them.
Im moving to japan

Also please dont make Austronaut Teemo and Bardnik icons Russian exclusives.

https://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/5/50/ProfileIcon1631_Bardnik.png/revision/latest?cb=20170412062503
https://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/7/76/ProfileIcon1630_Astronaut_Teemo.png/revision/latest?cb=20170412062501
What are those from?

> [{quoted}](name=Sophitia,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=MOrmmE69,comment-id=00110000,timestamp=2017-05-02T05:46:33.228+0000)
>
> What are those from?

Really?
Obviously they're from Russia, based off your post. I'm wondering if it's tied to an event I hadn't seen.

> [{quoted}](name=Sophitia,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=MOrmmE69,comment-id=0011000000000000,timestamp=2017-05-02T22:58:58.462+0000)
>
> Obviously they're from Russia, based off your post. I'm wondering if it's tied to an event I hadn't seen.

Anniversary of the First Man in space also known as Cosmonautics Day. Happens each April 12th.

>Austronaut Teemo

lelel.
I just realized how cool their voice sounds in japanese
I hope they do eventually decide to release them.
i want them on EUNE too, please rito :({{champion:32}}
Aw, I'm Japanese and would love to have this. Oh well, It's limited regionally so it's fine.

They might bring it to all regions for purchase eventually. I thought the Nami icon was going to be what was it oce exclusive? But they brought it for purchase for a couple weeks or something like thay. We might just have to wait(hopefully bc I really want them)
holy shit i forgot about these icons until today.  Dang I didn't realize they were japan exclusive.
I support this, I really like the Poro one. :(

Uhhhh doenst the OCE server have an event every year too? and we usually get those icons to buy like a week or two after.
Im sure these will come too.

The Japanese are so oblivious.

For real, how did you not pick Shen to be one of the champs to promote this? 

OMAERU WA SHINDERU
